game_description: Bad Tag is a multiplayer VR game that allows anybody to play it at no price whatsoever! Join your friends in a private room or a public with strangers and have fun exploring the various maps the game has to offer. By using your one or two controllers, have fun exploring the stuff Bad Tag VR has to offer.

review_3: I was playing this game today with a guy named TinyVR we went to the parkour map and while we were in the tunnel I was lagging out while we were playing for a bit I went to the leaderboard and I saw this guy name LUX WAS HERE repeated. We went to shop and we were pretty confused lux was talking to us with his name, we said that our game was lagging out and he said something and after that he said “and I will lag it out again” and he was counting down from 3 and mine and ging’s screen just froze for a bit and then he said “you can’t see me I’m in the viewer” then he set his name as a discord link, we were looking for him and I had to get off. So seriously WHO IS LUX? (P.S be said he was the one that made the game shut down.)
review_4: Add horror mode this game is a 9/10 for me but will be a 10/10 if horror mode was added
